controls.name: about_text
controls.alertBody: This is a dummy form design for testing the [Eclipse Form Outliner](https://github.com/JDeeth/EcmFormOutliner).

help.text: Must be HH:MM e.g. 09:45, 13:30 - not 9:45 or 09.45 or 1:30pm

label.value: Start work list for next lunch

controls.name: arbitrary_grid_layout
controls.alertBody:
This is to check the ordering controls where there are multiple controls in multiple columns in the same row.

Desired order is A1, B1, C1, D1, B2, C2, B3

controls.name: repeating_collection_guidance
controls.alertBody:
This is to check the display of a **repeatable collection**.

(has "add" and "remove" buttons like a table, but with an arbitrary layout not a table layout).

controls.name: statictext_3
controls.defaultValue: `Text` field, label hidden, label blank, optional

controls.name: statictext_4
controls.defaultValue: `Text` field, label hidden, label blank, optional

controls.name: statictext_5
controls.defaultValue: `Text` field, label hidden, label populated, optional

controls.name: statictext_6
controls.defaultValue: `Text` field, label hidden, label populated, mandatory

controls.name: arbitrary_markdown
controls.alertBody:
This text is **bold**. This text is *italic*. 

Here is a list:
- item A
- item B

Here is a numbered list:
1. item 1
2. item 2

This list has increased spacing:

- item AA

- item BB
- item CC

# Heading 1
## Heading 2
### Heading 3
#### Heading 4

This paragraph contains a line  
break.

Tables |are|also
 --: | :-: | :-- 
supported|which|is 
really|rather|nice
